kwargs.from: From number (optional if MessagingServiceSid is provided)
kwargs.MessagingServiceSid: the Messaging Service Sid (optional if From is provided)
kwargs.splitLength: length to use to split the message. Default is 320. Set to 0 to disable.
kwargs.body: Body of the message. Can be over 160 characters. (optional if MediaUrl is provided)
kwargs.mediaUrls: List of Media Urls to send. 5Mb liimit per file. (optional unless no Body is provided)
kwargs.ProvideFeedback: Enable Message Feedback API (optional, false by default)
kwargs.<other params for twilio's sendMessage A: Other params are also passed in right away to Twilio
